com.fasterxml.util.membuf.base

Class BytesSegment

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fasterxml.util.membuf.Segment<S>
      • com.fasterxml.util.membuf.base.SegmentBase<BytesSegment>
        • com.fasterxml.util.membuf.base.BytesSegment
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArrayBytesSegment, ByteBufferBytesSegment

    public abstract class BytesSegment
extends SegmentBase<BytesSegment>
    Intermediate base class for Segments used to store byte sequence values.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void append(byte[] src, int offset, int length)
      Append operation that appends specified data; caller must ensure that it will actually fit (if it can't, it should instead call tryAppend(byte[], int, int)).
      abstract byte read() 
      abstract void read(byte[] buffer, int offset, int length) 
      abstract int readLength()
      Method for trying to read VInt-encoded length indicator.
      abstract int readSplitLength(int partial)
      Method for reading VInt-encoded length indicator when the initial read (using readLength()) failed due to value being split on segment boundary.
      abstract boolean tryAppend(byte value)
      Append operation that tries to append a single value in this segment.
      abstract int tryAppend(byte[] src, int offset, int length)
      Append operation that tries to append as much of input data as possible, and returns number of bytes that were copied
      abstract int tryRead(byte[] buffer, int offset, int length)

        public abstract int tryAppend(byte[] src,
            int offset,
            int length)
        Append operation that tries to append as much of input data as possible, and returns number of bytes that were copied
        Returns:
        Number of bytes actually appended

      • tryAppend

        public abstract boolean tryAppend(byte value)
        Append operation that tries to append a single value in this segment.
        Returns:
        True if there was room and append succeeded; false if segment is full
